verses.text: In the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, in the \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w*, came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,
The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath been \w sore|strong="H7110"\w* \w displeased|strong="H7107"\w* with your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 1.2 \ft sore…: Heb. with displeasure\f*

Therefore \w say|strong="H0559"\w* thou unto them, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; \w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* ye unto me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, and I will \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* unto you, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

Be ye not as your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, unto whom the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* have \w cried|strong="H7121"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; \w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* ye now from your \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and \add from\add* your \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*: but they did not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, nor \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w* unto me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.
Your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, where \add are\add* they? and the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, do they \w live|strong="H2421"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*?

But my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* and my \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, which I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, did they not take \w hold|strong="H5381"\w* of your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*? and they \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Like as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w thought|strong="H2161"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto us, according to our \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, and according to our \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*, so hath he \w dealt|strong="H6213"\w* with us.\f + \fr 1.6 \ft take…: or, overtake\f*

¶ Upon the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w eleventh|strong="H6249"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, which \add is\add* the \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w Sebat|strong="H7627"\w*, in the \w second|strong="H8147"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Darius|strong="H1867"\w*, came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Berechiah|strong="H1296"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Iddo|strong="H5714"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and behold a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* upon a \w red|strong="H0122"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, and he \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* among the myrtle \w trees|strong="H1918"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w bottom|strong="H4699"\w*; and \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* him \add were there\add* \w red|strong="H0122"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w speckled|strong="H8320"\w*, and \w white|strong="H3836"\w*.\f + \fr 1.8 \ft speckled: or, bay\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, O my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, what \add are\add* these? And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* that \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with me \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, I will \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* thee what these \add be\add*.

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* among the myrtle \w trees|strong="H1918"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, These \add are they\add* whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* to and fro through the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

And they \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* among the myrtle \w trees|strong="H1918"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, We have walked to and \w fro|strong="H1980"\w* through the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and, behold, all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* sitteth \w still|strong="H3427"\w*, and is at \w rest|strong="H8252"\w*.

¶ Then the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, how long wilt thou not have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* on \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* and on the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, against which thou hast had \w indignation|strong="H2194"\w* these threescore and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*?

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* that \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with me \add with\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \add and\add* \w comfortable|strong="H5150"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

So the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* that \w communed|strong="H1696"\w* with me \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, \w Cry|strong="H7121"\w* thou, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; I am \w jealous|strong="H7065"\w* for \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* and for \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* with a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w*.

And I am \w very|strong="H1419"\w* \w sore|strong="H7110"\w* \w displeased|strong="H7107"\w* with the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w* \add that are\add* at \w ease|strong="H7600"\w*: for I was but a \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w displeased|strong="H7107"\w*, and they \w helped|strong="H5826"\w* forward the \w affliction|strong="H7451"\w*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; I am \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* with \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w*: my \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall be \w built|strong="H1129"\w* in it, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, and a \w line|strong="H6957"\w* shall be stretched \w forth|strong="H5186"\w* upon \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w Cry|strong="H7121"\w* yet, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; My \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* through \w prosperity|strong="H2896"\w* shall yet be spread \w abroad|strong="H6327"\w*; and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall yet \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, and shall yet \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.  +  r 1.17  t prosperity: Heb. good *
¶ Then lifted I \w up|strong="H5375"\w* mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, and behold \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w horns|strong="H7161"\w*.

And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* that \w talked|strong="H1696"\w* with me, What \add be\add* these? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* me, These \add are\add* the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* which have \w scattered|strong="H2219"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* me \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w carpenters|strong="H2796"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I, What \w come|strong="H0935"\w* these to \w do|strong="H6213"\w*? And he \w spake|strong="H0559"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, These \add are\add* the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* which have \w scattered|strong="H2219"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, so \w that|strong="H6310"\w* no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* did lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*: but these are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w fray|strong="H2729"\w* them, to cast \w out|strong="H3034"\w* the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*, which lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \add their\add* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* over the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* to \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* it.
